explanation: [0-0] A cat in a colorful striped shirt sits by a stove, holding a spatula in a pot. Below, many hamburger buns are placed on a plate. A part of a car can be seen in the background. In the lower right corner, there is a close-up of a cat's face with its eyes wide open and mouth agape.

[0-2] The scene cuts to a lady sitting in the driver's seat of a gray car, holding a giant sausage. Pictures of sausage, jelly, ice cream, and puffed food appear above. The car window rises, trapping half of the sausage. The scene switches to a cat in a colorful striped shirt sitting on the cement ground. The subtitle "Stop!" appears, and the cat walks away.
